title: Was Elvis Presley a good piano player? - Quora

response.answer_text: I seem to remember reading that Elvis was actually a better piano player than he was a guitar player. During the Million Dollar quartet sessions Elvis played piano even though Jerry Lee Lewis was there because even that early on in their careers Elvis was considered a better piano player. As much of an Elvis fan that I am I don’t think Elvis was great at playing either the guitar (that is known) or the piano. he could competently get by to accompany himself but that’s about it.
Define ‘good'! He was about as good a piano player as he was a guitar player. Take that any way you wish.
